point_of_interest: Butterfly Research Centre and Fundraiser Cafe
title: Nice place to Visit.
review: Wooden house of Fred Jr is simply Amazing...you would love to stay in John estate...it's very interesting place and many Bollywood films done here.

point_of_interest: Butterfly Research Centre and Fundraiser Cafe
title: Anxious to watch it
review: Modest museum with a collection of preserved moths & butterflies, plus frequent educational courses.

point_of_interest: Butterfly Research Centre and Fundraiser Cafe
title: No so cordial people here
review: We took a great effort to reach this place, however, there was no one who can answer us about this place. After reaching this place, we asked a person if it is open and we can visit this plane, despite that didn't get the answer.

point_of_interest: Butterfly Research Centre and Fundraiser Cafe
title: Beautiful location, Amazing Host and Butterflies
review: I came across this place while researching for butterflies for a painting project. The work Peter has done on butterflies is commendable. He is a great host with immense knowledge and a penchant to feed you good food and pick and drop you from the bus stand. The house is charming and is surrounded by forests. A rare place to stay.

point_of_interest: Butterfly Research Centre and Fundraiser Cafe
title: butterflies - a world of mimicry
review: good and large variety of collections of moths and butterflies. I was just an enthusiast; but his informative and interesting talks were very simple and no scientific terms used; this made the session more apt for novice like us. We come to know the butterfly world is not at all romantic and colorful. Colors are their survival trick. He has a large collections of Indian species and reference also. The species from other parts of the world are sent by his friends.

point_of_interest: Butterfly Research Centre and Fundraiser Cafe
title: A way of life
review: This place reinforces how being one with nature is a way of life. The amazing collection of butterflies, moths and myriad other creatures take your breath away, and Peter is always gracious enough to share his vast knowledge on the subject. Every nook and cranny of the house, every piece of antique furniture has a story. You wake up to the chirping of birds and take in the myriad hues of nature. Food is definitely a highlight. Local seasonal - mostly organic food, along with home made peanut butter, jams and pickles served with utmost love and care only add to the list of pleasures one experiences here. And if one observes closely enough, there is so much to learn on every aspect of coexistence with nature without necessarily being the exploitative consumerist we have all become.

point_of_interest: Butterfly Research Centre and Fundraiser Cafe
title: Excellent food
review: We had delicious, home-cooked food over several days while staying at the Butterfly Research Centre.

point_of_interest: Butterfly Research Centre and Fundraiser Cafe
title: A must visit if you are in Bhimtal
review: I did a google for the places to visit in Bhimtal and it was one of the topmost things here to do. And certainly, it is.

point_of_interest: Butterfly Research Centre and Fundraiser Cafe
title: More than a cafe
review: The food was good for sure but what is great is the rich experience of knowing about butterflies, seeing some amazing ones and the conversations with the owner are stimulating, the sound of the jungle, the scent of pine.... it’s a special experience!!

point_of_interest: Butterfly Research Centre and Fundraiser Cafe
title: Come for butterflies, Stay for the food
review: Stayed here with a few classmates for two weeks during our study abroad program and completely loved every minute of it. If you are passing by Bhimtal, you must see the Butterfly cafe, try Shiela-ji's food, and have a chat with Peter-ji! Shiela-ji makes the best home-cooked food in Bhimtal, and Peter-ji can talk about anything and everything. I would definitely visit again!!

point_of_interest: Butterfly Research Centre and Fundraiser Cafe
title: Training
review: It was wonderful time at BRC. I found refreshing environment with sound of birds and colors of butterflies. Thorough guidance about butterfly, Comfortable rooms and delicious food is attracting me towards it. I must tell you, this is wonderful place to stay and enjoy

point_of_interest: Butterfly Research Centre and Fundraiser Cafe
title: Fun visit when stayin at Fredy's Bungalow, Bhintal in the same compound
review: Peter Smetacek's research centre is a real hidden gem and we enjoyed our our limited interaction with him. Incredible info on these beautiful insects and the nature trail right next to it cannot be missed.

point_of_interest: Butterfly Research Centre and Fundraiser Cafe
title: A Slice of Paradise
review: I stayed at the Butterfly Research Center (BRC) with my two kids and wife after booking it through Air BnB. BRC is housed in a colonial bungalow well preserved for our benefit. On one side of the bungalow is a sharp ridge and on the other is a lovely forest with its wildlife. If u r lucky u may catch glimpse of the deer who come right up to the house. It's also a bird watchers paradise with many a birds nesting on the property itself.

point_of_interest: Butterfly Research Centre and Fundraiser Cafe
title: Amazing collection of butterflies, great history
review: A private collection of butterfly specimens, 4th largest in the country. Wonderful owner and guide, we spent a fascinating couple of hours learning from him and his partner.

point_of_interest: Butterfly Research Centre and Fundraiser Cafe
title: No words can Explain Beauty of Nature ( BUTTERFLIES , MOTHS & INSECTS ) Specimen Collection.
review: No words can Explain Beauty of Nature ( BUTTERFLIES ) Specimen Collection. I went with my Family and Really Enjoyed a Lot , Peace of Silence in the Room and I captured the Beauty of Nature - BUTTERFLIES on my Camera. It was our Bad Luck that we could not meet the Owner - Mr.Peter Smetacek of the Excellent Collection of Butterflies , Moths and Insects.

point_of_interest: Butterfly Research Centre and Fundraiser Cafe
title: A perfect rendezvous
review: Apart from the rare collection and Peter as a wonderful friend, philosopher and guide; it is a perfect getaway from the city. The bungalow is equipped with all modern amenities. Yet, it serves as a livid window to the style and culture of the nineteenth century when it was built. My family loved the weeklong cozy stay.

point_of_interest: Butterfly Research Centre and Fundraiser Cafe
title: Worth stopping in to Peters' place.
review: Very rare and exotic butterfly collection starting from Peter's grandfather's time in Africa and Papua New Guinea.

point_of_interest: Butterfly Research Centre and Fundraiser Cafe
title: What an interesting place !!
review: Had booked through bnb and Peter was an informed and knowledgeable host.  It was a lovely stay and he was kind enough to make us a late dinner. He even played the guitar with us and sung a few songs.it was a wonderful evening. The butterfly collection is exotic and beautiful. His dogs too add charm to the place. The property is well maintained and cozy.

point_of_interest: Butterfly Research Centre and Fundraiser Cafe
title: Butterfly
review: Just one word I will say.... Superb. Type of butterfly was so good. I would like to say that everyone should go there. U can play with piano also.

point_of_interest: Butterfly Research Centre and Fundraiser Cafe
title: Good for who intrest in Butterfly
review: You will find butterfly in huge. Display area is not good. Lady tells us some good facts. Place worth for who have inters in small spices like butterfly and moth

point_of_interest: Butterfly Research Centre and Fundraiser Cafe
title: Good learning experience
review: Good collection and explanation . Children will love it. Do take a camera with you. Check the timings with your hotel

point_of_interest: Butterfly Research Centre and Fundraiser Cafe
title: One time watch
review: It is a one time watch place, nothing like a butterfly museum in singapore or other countries, good for kids.

point_of_interest: Butterfly Research Centre and Fundraiser Cafe
title: A must visit specially for kids
review: It's a place you must visit, and, specially, if you have a kid. I always found butterflies beautiful and moths annoying but except for the cursory glances never gave them a second thought. But my visit to the museum and listening to the delightful stories of Mr. Smetacek really opened my eyes, literally. Butterflies, moths, and these tiny cicadas and flies are no doubt fascinating. The hour or so interaction was no less than an enjoyable beginners course.

point_of_interest: Butterfly Research Centre and Fundraiser Cafe
title: Lots n lots of butterfly
review: Want to see butterfly in its own habituate than this place is to visit. No much to see can go only if you have spare time.

point_of_interest: Butterfly Research Centre and Fundraiser Cafe
title: amazing collection
review: it was a amazing collection and walking distance from mountain club. Had never seen so many butterfly in my life.

point_of_interest: Butterfly Research Centre and Fundraiser Cafe
title: one of a kind...
review: great learning, humbling experiense ,, hard work of a single man! must for kids and nature lovers ! very quaint ans secluded .. no touristy and very different

point_of_interest: Butterfly Research Centre and Fundraiser Cafe
title: A must visit place
review: Must visit place. Antique bungalow, one of the largest collection of butterflies, surrounding hills, forests and lakes, mouth-watering food and finally the Man Peter Smetacek - who will be the best host you'll ever have... There is nothing better than someone with such good command over his field of expertise and yet so humble...

point_of_interest: Butterfly Research Centre and Fundraiser Cafe
title: Amazing amalgamation of science, nature and hospitality
review: I guess there are hardly any places in India like BRC where one can find amazing amalgamation of science, nature and hospitality. To me a travel without learning is of no use! BRC is such a place where one can feel science of evolution/speciation, conservation, nature's peace and above all a wonderful person to explain you all this with his vast knowledge and expertise. I recommend that one should visit along with friends/family/colleagues at least once in their lifetime. Good luck!

point_of_interest: Butterfly Research Centre and Fundraiser Cafe
title: Unique Place To Visit
review: The Butterfly research middle is placed on a hillock near  the Bhimtal lake and homes the forth biggest butterfly and moth reference series an India. approximately 1300 species of butterflies to be found in India, Bhimtal on my own has around 240 species. The museum has some implausible beautiful collection of butterflies , Mouth, Beetles, spiders and different bugs.

point_of_interest: Butterfly Research Centre and Fundraiser Cafe
title: Outstanding Butterfly and Moth Collection!
review: This is the largest private butterfly and moth collection in India.  More than 2000 species.  Some really beautiful butterflies, some very rare ones.  Interesting insects too (beetles, scorpions).  The very gracious hosts will personally conduct you around the collection, and explain everything, and answer questions.  As a bonus, there's a beautifully produced book of origami butterflies for children for sale (ages 7+).

point_of_interest: Butterfly Research Centre and Fundraiser Cafe
title: An undiscovered place
review: This Centre has a huge collection of butterflies, moths, beetles, scorpions and other insects.....

point_of_interest: Butterfly Research Centre and Fundraiser Cafe
title: Average
review: We had heard a lot about the butterfly research center. The display area is quite shoddy and disappointing . It is just a small , shabby room where the display is. The lady who explained and showed us around made it interesting and told us some interesting facts which made the effort of coming here somewhat worth it.

point_of_interest: Butterfly Research Centre and Fundraiser Cafe
title: Don't miss Peter Smetacek 's butterfly collection
review: Look at Peter's collection, listen to him and try your hands at the origami sets he has created and enjoy his hospitality

point_of_interest: Butterfly Research Centre and Fundraiser Cafe
title: World of Colour Wings
review: Fascinating collection & display of butterflies.. such colourful collection under one roof is unimaginable..!!

point_of_interest: Butterfly Research Centre and Fundraiser Cafe
title: Beautiful Butterflies and Biodiversity of Bhimtal
review: This is a great museum created by legendary late Frederick Smetacek.This place is not huge but encompasses years of patient and painstaking research and preservation of exotic butterfly specimens,larvae etc.Mr.Peter takes you around with great understanding,knowledge and patience.

point_of_interest: Butterfly Research Centre and Fundraiser Cafe
title: Average place
review: Only go there if you have enough stamina to climb as it is very steep and there is only one or two flowers and butterfly research centre is closed

point_of_interest: Butterfly Research Centre and Fundraiser Cafe
title: Small but good place for butterfly lovers
review: Small but good place for butterfly lovers, but road from Bhimtal lake to this placed is in pathetic condition.
